title: Application of South African heulandite (HEU) zeolite for the adsorption and removal of Pb<sup>2+</sup> and Cd<sup>2+</sup> ions from aqueous water solution: Experimental and computational study
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Fred S. Wanyonyi, Francis Orata, Gershom K. Mutua, Michael O. Odey, Sizwe Zamisa, Sopuruchukwu E. Ogbodo, Francis Maingi, Anthony Pembere
